projects.name: Energy Spectra Alignment (CMDA Capstone)
projects.description: Developed a web application using Flask and Plotly to visualize and align energy spectra data from BoostAR detectors, enhancing data analysis capabilities for radiation detection.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills, also the website you are currently visiting.

projects.name: Wordle Solver
projects.description: Uses Requests, Selenium, and BeautifulSoup to navigate to the Wordle game, input guesses, and scrape results to help solve the puzzle.

projects.name: Media Bias & Stance Analysis of Russian-Ukraine Conflict
projects.description: Developed a Natural Language Processing (NLP) classification model in Jupyter Notebooks, utilizing Sentiment Analysis and TF-IDF, to quantitatively differentiate and predict the geopolitical stance (pro-Russian vs. pro-Ukrainian) of news articles
